title: Face unlock stops working every 2-3 days, pixel 4 xl, the issue persists after reboot
content:
Face unlock stop working every 2-3 days, pixel 4 xl, the issue persists after reboot. The other issue is the black screen after picking a call.

I chat with google support and was asked to bring this phone to the location reparation store. Not sure whether Google knows how to fix this issue since it seems to be a software issue.
